summary:
Welcome to the matrix Neo Pepe. - Remember, choice is an illusion created between those with power and those without.

 Buy Now - 

 About - The matrix is a virtual simulation that has been pulled over the mind of the ignorant to hide them from the real truth of the world. You have to make the choice to escape.

 How to Buy - 1. Create an Ethereum Wallet
2. Buy some Ethereum
3. Go to Uniswap
4. Convert ETH to $NEOP

 Tokenomics - Token Supply: 420,000,000,000
No buy tax. No sell tax.
90% of the tokens were sent to the liquidity pool.
5% is for marketing, giveaways, the team
5% is for CEX listings and will be public under the ens: neopepecexwallet.eth

 Roadmap - Phase 1: Launch
- Coingecko & Coinmarketcap Listings
- Dextools
- 1,000+ holders
Phase 2: Spread Awareness
- Community partnerships with massive outreach
- CEX listings
- Get $NEOP trending on Twitter with Matrix Memes
Phase 3: Escape the Matrix
- Take the leap of faith, will you take the pepe pill? *Stay Tuned*
- MORE CEX LISTINGS
- MORE MEMES/CULTURE ON TWITTER
- 10,000+ HOLDERS
